<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Userselection">fe56788497ab1110f0d21c800153af46</macroponent><name>list_1/fixedQuery</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
	return `sys_idIN${ api.state.selectedSysIds.join(',') }^NQ`;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-28 20:15:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>c5704d4097eb1110f0d21c800153af89</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>list_1/fixedQuery</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Meetup Playbook" source="x_81849_meetup_pla">34f238c8976b1110f0d21c800153af2d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Meetup Playbook">34f238c8976b1110f0d21c800153af2d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c5704d4097eb1110f0d21c800153af89</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 20:15:35</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api

  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  let query = `nameLIKE${api.state.searchTerm}^ORlocation.nameLIKE${api.state.searchTerm}`;

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-28 20:38:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>b5a50dc497eb1110f0d21c800153af54</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>list_1/query</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Meetup Playbook" source="x_81849_meetup_pla">34f238c8976b1110f0d21c800153af2d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Meetup Playbook">34f238c8976b1110f0d21c800153af2d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b5a50dc497eb1110f0d21c800153af54</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 20:38:18</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {any} params.imports

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-28 20:44:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>1927494897eb1110f0d21c800153af56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>conditional_checklist/NODE__conditionals_0_condition</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Meetup Playbook" source="x_81849_meetup_pla">34f238c8976b1110f0d21c800153af2d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Meetup Playbook">34f238c8976b1110f0d21c800153af2d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1927494897eb1110f0d21c800153af56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 20:44:49</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {

    let encQuery = "watch_list=" + api.state.selectedSysIds.join(",");
    console.log(encQuery);

    api.data.update_record_1.execute({

* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    //debugger;
    let selectedSysIds = api.data.look_up_record_1.result.watch_list.value;
    console.log (selectedSysIds);
    let selectedSysIdsArr = selectedSysIds.split(',') || [];

        "type" : "CLIENT_TRANSFORM_SCRIPT",
        "script" : {
          "apiVersion" : "1.0.0",
          "controllerElementId" : null,
          "inlineScript" : "/**\n* @param {params} params\n* @param {api} params.api\n* @param {any} params.event\n* @param {any} params.imports\n*/\nfunction evaluateEvent({api, event}) {\n\t// INSERT ANY CUSTOM SUFFICIENT DATA LOGIC HERE\n\n\tconst {\n\t\tassociatedTable,\n\t\tassociatedRecord,\n\t\texperienceProperties,\n\t\tactivityState,\n\t\tactivityLabel\n\t} = api.context.props;\n\n\tconst {\n\t\tdescription = {},\n\t\ttitle = {},\n\t\tassociated_table = {},\n\t\tassociated_record = {},\n\t\tform_fields = {},\n\t\tform_view = {},\n\t\trecord_fields = {},\n\t\tattachment_source = {},\n\t\tshow_checklist = {}\n\t} = experienceProperties;\n\n\tconst propName = 'hasSufficientData';\n\n\t// a card is sufficient with a description or title\n\tif (description.value || title.value)\n\t    return {\n\t\t\tpropName,\n\t\t\tvalue: true\n\t\t};\n\n\t// without a description or title, a card must have an associated record and table\n\tif (!associated_table.value || !associated_record.value)\n\t    return {\n\t\t    propName,\n\t\t    value: false\n\t    };\n\n\t// If we have data to show for this associated record, we're all set\n\tif (\n\t\tform_fields.value ||\n\t\tform_view.value ||\n\t\trecord_fields.value ||\n\t\tattachment_source.value ||\n\t\tshow_checklist.value\n\t)\n\t\treturn {\n\t\t\tpropName,\n\t\t\tvalue: true\n\t\t};\n\n\t// No data to show\n\treturn {\n\t\tpropName,\n\t\tvalue: false\n\t};\n}",
          "scriptSysId" : null,
          "target" : null
        }
      },
      "sysId" : "32408b42ff7a10109046e490703bf176"
    },
    "operation" : null,
    "targetId" : "cksjjgdduejjaaaaaamddhiiddqhhlaeuzdd",

        "script" : {
          "apiVersion" : "1.0.0",
          "controllerElementId" : null,
          "inlineScript" : "/**\n* @param {params} params\n* @param {api} params.api\n* @param {any} params.event\n* @param {any} params.imports\n*/\nfunction evaluateEvent({api, event}) {\n\t// INSERT ANY CUSTOM SUFFICIENT DATA LOGIC HERE\n\n\tconst {\n\t\tassociatedTable,\n\t\tassociatedRecord,\n\t\texperienceProperties,\n\t\tactivityState,\n\t\tactivityLabel\n\t} = api.context.props;\n\n\tconst {\n\t\tdescription = {},\n\t\ttitle = {},\n\t\tassociated_table = {},\n\t\tassociated_record = {},\n\t\tform_fields = {},\n\t\tform_view = {},\n\t\trecord_fields = {},\n\t\tattachment_source = {},\n\t\tshow_checklist = {}\n\t} = experienceProperties;\n\n\tconst propName = 'hasSufficientData';\n\n\t// a card is sufficient with a description or title\n\tif (description.value || title.value)\n\t    return {\n\t\t\tpropName,\n\t\t\tvalue: true\n\t\t};\n\n\t// without a description or title, a card must have an associated record and table\n\tif (!associated_table.value || !associated_record.value)\n\t    return {\n\t\t    propName,\n\t\t    value: false\n\t    };\n\n\t// If we have data to show for this associated record, we're all set\n\tif (\n\t\tform_fields.value ||\n\t\tform_view.value ||\n\t\trecord_fields.value ||\n\t\tattachment_source.value ||\n\t\tshow_checklist.value\n\t)\n\t\treturn {\n\t\t\tpropName,\n\t\t\tvalue: true\n\t\t};\n\n\t// No data to show\n\treturn {\n\t\tpropName,\n\t\tvalue: false\n\t};\n}",
          "scriptSysId" : null,
          "target" : null
        }
      },
